item.title: Network - the new student exclusive application that is rethinking the university experience
item.author: Erald Veliaj,
item.description: Network, a student exclusive application founded by Erald Veliaj, launched this summer at Goldsmiths, University of London and has now opened up for Imperial. The application automatically connects students based on information such as the course they’re taking, what country they’re from and who …
